LanguageData.ArchotechSacrificerBeltAnimalSettingTool: Toggle whether the archotech sacrificer belt should count colony animals as well when picking a random pawn to die. Default = false.
LanguageData.ArchotechSacrificerBeltPrisonerSettingTo: Toggle whether the archotech sacrificer belt should count prisoners as well when picking a random pawn to die. Default = false.
LanguageData.ArchotechSacrificerBeltThoughtSettingLab: Archotech sacrificer belt gives mood debuff
LanguageData.ArchotechSacrificerBeltThoughtSettingToo: Toggle whether the archotech sacrificer belt gives a mood debuff to its wearer upon resurrection. Default = true.
LanguageData.ArchotechNeurotrainerSettingTooltip: A multiplier on the amount of experience granted to all skills when the archotech neurotrainer is used. Default = 1x (42,000 experience); minimum = 0.1x (4,200 experience); maximum = 10x (420,000 experience).
LanguageData.GrowerMechSerumSettingTooltip: A multiplier on the age increase from using a grower mech serum. Default = 0.3x (30% of life expectancy); minimum = 0.1x (10% of life expectancy); maximum = 10x (1,000% of life expectancy).
LanguageData.RevitalizerMechSerumSettingTooltip: A multiplier on the age decrease from using a revitalizer mech serum. Default = 0.3x (30% of life expectancy); minimum = 0.3x (30% of life expectancy); maximum = 10x (1,000% of life expectancy).
LanguageData.AntiPsychicPulserAffectsAllSettingToolti: Toggle whether the anti-psychic pulser affects all pawns on the map instead of just colonists. Default = true.
LanguageData.MindSuppressorStrengthSettingTooltip: A multiplier on the rate of resistance reduced by the mind suppressor when installed on a prisoner. Default = 0.1x (1 resistance per day); minimum = 0.1x (1 resistance per day); maximum = 1x (10 resistance per day).
LanguageData.RewardStandardHighFreqWeightFactorSettin: A multiplier on the weight of high-frequency standard rewards. Note that this category also includes many other items, not just artifacts, so those items will also become more common. Default = 1x (weight 4); minimum = 1x (weight 4); maximum = 2.5x (weight 10).
